properties.title: Wine tasting centre Viniterra Lake Biel
properties.abstract: The Vinothek Vinterra proposes an ideal introduction into the rich assortment of Lake Biel wines.
properties.description:
In cosy ambiance, here you can taste wines under no obligation. And tasting and talking shop as you ponder on your favourite wine can take place alone, as a twosome, or even in a group.

The unique 100-year-old Propfh√ºsli at the heart of the vines in Twann, the centrally located wine growing region of Lake Biel, has been restored and welcomes guests with open doors as a meeting place for wine tasting and purchases.
properties.name: Vinothek Viniterra Bielersee
